comment: Any half-space of the n-dimensional Real numbers is Lebesgue measurable. Lemma 115F of [Fremlin1] p. 31. This proof handles the non-trivial cases (nonzero dimension and finite outer measure) (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
